name: Girls' Frontline - Tomorrow, With You (Demo)
description:
It's 207X and WW3 never happened. Your name is Shiki Kan, a young high school boy who's been recruited to join an academy made for all the androids that were no longer needed for the war.  There's one thing though... it's an all-girls school.. and they're pretty cute...

Girls' Frontline: Tomorrow, With You  is a fan-made visual novel based on the Girls' Frontline  mobile game universe and characters.  It's still in very early stages of development, the current plan is to eventually release a full-length game.

Enjoy this demo of the game on Mac, PC ,and Android ( thought there might be a few graphical issues on Android).
